lines.english: O Allah, I begin the glorification of You with praising You
and You always guide us to the right out of Your favors upon us.

lines.transliteration: wa ayqantu annaka anta arhamu alrrahimina
lines.english: I am certain that You are the most Merciful of all those who show mercy
in situations of pardon and mercy,
the harshest in punishments
in situations of giving exemplary punishment and chastisement (to the wrongdoers),
and the greatest Omnipotent
in the domain of absolute power and might.

lines.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَذِنْتَ لِي فِي دُعَائِكَ وَمَسْأَلَتِكَ
lines.transliteration: allahumma adhinta li fi du`a'ika wa mas'alatika
lines.english: O Allah, You have permitted me to pray and beseech You.
So, listen, O All-hearer, to my words of praise,
reply my prayer, O All-merciful,
and overlook my slips, O Oft-Forgiving.

lines.arabic: فَكَمْ يَا إِلٰهِي مِنْ كُرْبَةٍ قَدْ فَرَّجْتَهَا
lines.transliteration: fakam ya ilahi min kurbatin qad farrajtaha
lines.english: You, O my God, have relieved so many of my grievances,
dispelled so many of my sorrows,
overlooked so many of my slips,
spread over me many of Your mercies,
and unlocked so many rings of misfortunes (in which I was detained).

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ صَاحِبَةً وَلاَ وَلَداً
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi lam yattakhidh sahibatan wa la waladan
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Who has not betaken wife or son,

lines.arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ شَرِيكٌ فِي ٱلْمُلْكِ
lines.transliteration: wa lam yakun lahu sharikun fi almulki
lines.english: Who has no partner in the sovereignty

lines.arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ وَلِيٌّ مِنَ ٱلذُّلِّ
lines.transliteration: wa lam yakun lahu waliyyun min aldhdhulli
lines.english: nor does He have any protecting friend through dependence.
And Magnify Him with all magnificence.
All praise be to Allah with full gratitude
for all His bounties.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ مُضَادَّ لَهُ فِي مُلْكِهِ
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi la mudadda lahu fi mulkihi
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Who has no opposition in His rule

lines.transliteration: wa la munazi`a lahu fi amrihi
lines.english: nor there is any challenge to His commands.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ فِي خَلْقِهِ
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi la sharika lahu fi khalqihi
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Who has no counsel to meddle with His operation of creation
nor there is anything similar to Him in His greatness.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْفَاشِي فِي ٱلْخَلْقِ أَمْرُهُ وَحَمْدُهُ
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alfashi fi alkhalqi amruhu wa hamduhu
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Whose commandments and praise are active in the creation,
His glory is evident through His kindness,
His distinct overflowing generosity is freely available,
His unlimited bestowals do not exhaust,

lines.arabic: وَلاَ تَزِيدُهُ كَثْرَةُ ٱلْعَطَاءِ إِلاَّ جُوداً وَكَرَماً
lines.transliteration: wa la taziduhu kathratu al`ata'i illa judan wa karaman
lines.english: and Whose opulent bestowals increase Him nothing but magnanimity and generosity.
Verily He is Mighty, Abundantly Giver.

lines.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ قَلِيلاً مِنْ كَثِيرٍ
lines.transliteration: allahumma inni as'aluka qalilan min kathirin
lines.english: O Allah, I beseech You for little from the much,
along with my great need for it
and Your needlessness for it is since eternity.
For me, it is so big
but for You, it is effortless and easy.
O Allah, as You pardon my sins,
overlook my mistakes,
take a lenient view of my disorderly conduct,
cover up my hideous actions,
and treat my numerous offenses with forbearance,

lines.arabic: عِنْدَ مَا كَانَ مِنْ خَطَإِي وَعَمْدِي
lines.english: which I have committed mistakenly and willfully—

lines.arabic: أَطْمَعَنِي فِي أَنْ أَسْأَلَكَ مَا لاَ أَسْتَوْجِبُهُ مِنْكَ
lines.transliteration: atma`ani fi an as'alaka ma la astawjibuhu minka
lines.english: all that tempted me to ask for that which I do not deserve from You,
that is You may grant me part of Your mercy,
show me part of Your all-powerfulness,
and show me signals of Your response to me.
So, I am now supplicating You with security
and beseeching You with entertainment
neither afraid nor fearful,

lines.arabic: مُدِلاًّ عَلَيْكَ فِيمَا قَصَدْتُ فِيهِ إِلَيْكَ
lines.transliteration: mudillan `alayka fi ma qasadtu fihi ilayka
lines.english: insisting on You in that which I face to You.

lines.arabic: فَإِنْ أَبْطَأَ عَنِّي عَتَبْتُ بِجَهْلِي عَلَيْكَ
lines.english: But when Your response delayed, I, out of my ignorance, would blame You

lines.arabic: وَلَعَلَّ ٱلَّذِي أَبْطَأَ عَنِّي هُوَ خَيْرٌ لِي
lines.transliteration: wa la`alla alladhi abta'a `anni huwa khayrun li
lines.english: although perhaps slowing down may be a blessing in disguise,
because You alone know the consequences of all matters.
So, I have never seen such a noble Master

lines.arabic: أَصْبَرَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدٍ لَئِيمٍ مِنْكَ عَلَيَّ
lines.english: more accommodating to such a dissatisfied servant than You are to me.

lines.arabic: يَا رَبِّ إِنَّكَ تَدْعُونِي فَأُوَلِّي عَنْكَ
lines.english: O Lord! You give an invitation but I turn down,
You become familiar with me but I do not care for You,

lines.transliteration: wa tatawaddadu ilayya fala aqbalu minka
lines.english: and You show affection to me but I do not correspond to You,
as if You are overreaching me!

lines.arabic: فَلَمْ يَمْنَعْكَ ذٰلِكَ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَةِ لِي
lines.transliteration: falam yamna`ka dhalika min alrrahmati li
lines.english: Yet, all that have not stopped You from having mercy upon me,
doing favors to me,
and blessing me out of Your magnanimity and generosity.
So, (please) have mercy on Your ignorant servant
and bestow upon him with the favors of Your beneficence.
Verily, You are All-magnanimous and All-generous.
All praise be to Allah: the Lord of the sovereignty,
Who allows arks to flow [on seas],
Who controls the winds,
Who causes the day to break,
Who administers the authority,
and Who is the Lord of the worlds.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَىٰ حِلْمِهِ بَعْدَ عِلْمِهِ
lines.english: All praise be to Allah for His indulgence although He has full acquaintance with all things.

lines.arabic: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَىٰ عَفْوِهِ بَعْدَ قُدْرَتِهِ
lines.english: All praise be to Allah for His amnesty although He has full power over all things.

lines.arabic: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَىٰ طُولِ أَنَاتِهِ فِي غَضَبِهِ
lines.transliteration: walhamdu lillahi `ala tuli anatihi fi ghadabihi
lines.english: All praise be to Allah for the respite that He allows in spite of provocation.
He is able to do whatever He wills.
All praise be to Allah, the Creator of all created beings,
Who makes sustenance freely available,
Who starts the day,
Who is the Owner of glory, might,
favors and bounties;
and Who is so far away that none can ever see Him
and, in the same time, He is so nigh that He is fully aware of even the whispering secrets.
Blessed and Exalted be He.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَيْسَ لَهُ مُنَازِعٌ يُعَادِلُهُ
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi laysa lahu munazi`un yu`adiluhu
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Who has no equal to challenge Him,
nor is there an image comparable to Him,
nor is there a helper to assist Him.
He tames the powerful by His force,
and disgraced are the great ones before His Greatness.
So, He, through His power, fulfills that which He wills.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يُجِيبُنِي حِينَ أُنَادِيهِ
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi yujibuni hina unadihi
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Who gives answer to me whenever I call Him,

lines.arabic: وَيَسْتُرُ عَلَيَّ كُلَّ عَوْرَةٍ وَأَنَا أَعْصِيهِ
lines.transliteration: wa yasturu `alayya kulla `awratin wa ana a`sihi
lines.english: covers up my shortcomings, yet I disobey Him,
and gives me the largest part of bounties, yet I do not show him gratitude.

lines.arabic: فَكَمْ مِنْ مَوْهِبَةٍ هَنِيئَةٍ قَدْ أَعْطَانِي
lines.transliteration: fakam min mawhibatin hani'atin qad a`tani
lines.english: Many an auspicious favor had He given me,
many a terrible danger had He turned off,
and many a blossoming joy had He made available for me.
Therefore, I praise Him with thankfulness
and mention Him with exaltation.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ يُهْتَكُ حِجَابُهُ
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi la yuhtaku hijabuhu
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Whose screen cannot be penetrated,
Whose door is not blocked,
Whose beseecher is not rejected,
and one who hopes Him is not disappointed.
All praise be to Allah Who secures the frightened ones,
comes to the help of the upright ones,
promotes the cause of the weak ones,
annihilates the autocrats,

lines.transliteration: wa yuhliku mulukan wa yastakhlifu akharina
lines.english: destroys rulers, and appoints others instead.
All praise be to Allah; the Eradicator of the tyrants,
the Terminator of the unjust ones,
the Catcher of the fugitives,
the Punisher of the unjust ones,
the Aide of the aid-seekers,
the Settler of the needs of the beseechers,
and the support of the faithful believers.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي مِنْ خَشْيَتِهِ تَرْعُدُ ٱلسَّمَاءُ وَسُكَّانُهَا
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi min khashyatihi tar`udu alssama'u wa sukkanuha
lines.english: All praise be to Allah! In His awe-inspiring fear the heavens and its dwellers tremble and shiver,
the earth and its inhabitants shake and quiver,

lines.arabic: وَتَمُوجُ ٱلْبِحَارُ وَمَنْ يَسْبَحُ فِي غَمَرَاتِهَا
lines.transliteration: wa tamuju albiharu wa man yasbahu fi ghamaratiha
lines.english: and the oceans and all that which float and swim in their waters flow together in excitement and tumult.
All praise be to Allah Who has guided us to this.

lines.arabic: وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِيَ لَوْلاَ أَنْ هَدَانَا ٱللَّهُ
lines.transliteration: wa ma kunna linahtadiya lawla an hadana allahu
lines.english: We could not truly have been led aright if Allah had not guided us.

lines.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يَخْلُقُ وَلَمْ يُخْلَقْ
lines.transliteration: alhamdu lillahi alladhi yakhluqu wa lam yukhlaq
lines.english: All praise be to Allah Who creates but He is not created,
gives subsistence but He needs no provisions,
feeds but He takes no nourishment,
causes the living to die,
and brings the dead to life,
but He is the Ever-living Who never dies.
In His hands is all the good
and He is able to do all things.

lines.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ عَبْدِكَ وَرَسُولِكَ
lines.english: O Allah, (please do) send blessings to Muhammad; Your servant, Messenger,

lines.transliteration: wa aminika wa safiyyika wa habibika
lines.english: confidant, friend, beloved intimate,
the choicest of Your created beings,
the bearer of Your sacraments,
and the conveyor of Your messages,
with the most superior, the most exquisite, the most handsomer,

lines.transliteration: wa akmala wa azka wa anma
lines.english: the most perfect, the most upright, the most prospering,

lines.transliteration: wa atyaba wa athara wa asna
lines.english: the most pleasant, the most thoroughly purified, the most sublime,

lines.transliteration: wa akthara ma sallayta wa barakta
lines.english: the most and the best blessings, advantages,
mercies, affections,

lines.arabic: وَسَلَّمْتَ عَلَىٰ أَحَدٍ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ وَأَنْبِيَائِكَ
lines.transliteration: wa sallamta `ala ahadin min `ibadika wa anbiya'ika
lines.english: and salutations that You have ever bestowed upon anyone of Your servants, Prophets,
Messengers, choicest people,
and those honored by You from among Your created beings.

lines.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ وَصَلِّ عَلَىٰ عَلِيٍّ أَمِيرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
lines.english: O Allah, (please do) send blessings to `Ali; the Commander of the Believers,
the successor of the Messenger of the Lord of the worlds,
Your servant, Your beloved representative, the brother of Your Messenger,
Your decisive argument over the mankind,
Your most important sign,
and the great news (from You).
(Please do) send blessings to the truthful and pure Lady,
Fatimah; the Doyenne of the women of the world.
(Please do) send blessings to the sons of ‘the mercy to the worlds’
and the two leaders of true guidance;
al-Hasan and al-Husayn,
the two Chiefs of the dwellers of Paradise.
(Please do) send blessings to the leaders of the Muslims;
`Ali bin al-Husayn,
Muhammad bin `Ali,
Ja`far bin Muhammad,
Musa bin Ja`far,
`Ali bin Musa,
Muhammad bin `Ali,
`Ali bin Muhammad,
al-Hasan bin `Ali,
and the successor, the guide, and the rightly guided:
(Those Imams are) Your decisive arguments over Your servants
and Your trustworthy confidants in Your lands
with blessings that are numerous and non-stop.
O Allah, (please do) send blessings to the custodian of Your commandments,
the vigilant guardian, the reliable patron,
and the awaited establisher of justice.
And (please) surround him with Your favorite angels
and assist him with the Holy Spirit.
O Lord of the worlds!
O Allah, (please) choose him to be the caller to Your Book
and the establisher of Your religion;
make him succeed in the earth
as You caused those who were before him to succeed,

lines.arabic: مَكِّنْ لَهُ دِينَهُ ٱلَّذِي ٱرْتَضَيْتَهُ لَهُ
lines.transliteration: makkin lahu dinahu alladhi irtadaytahu lahu
lines.english: establish for him his faith which You have approved for him,
and give him in exchange safety after the fear.
He serves You. He ascribes nothing as partner to You.
O Allah, (please) grant him power, make him the source of power,
grant him support, make him the means of Your victory,
help him with a mighty help,
make him prevail over all with easiness,

lines.arabic: وَٱجْعَلْ لَهُ مِنْ لَدُنْكَ سُلْطَاناً نَصِيراً
lines.transliteration: waj`al lahu min ladunka sultanan nasiran
lines.english: and delegate him Your controlling authority.

lines.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَظْهِرْ بِهِ دِينَكَ وَسُنَّةَ نَبِيِّكَ
lines.transliteration: allahumma azhir bihi dinaka wa sunnata nabiyyika
lines.english: O Allah, (please) make prevalent Your religion and the norms of Your Prophet through him

lines.arabic: حَتَّىٰ لاَ يَسْتَخْفِيَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ
lines.transliteration: hatta la yastakhfiya bishay'in min alhaqqi
lines.english: so that he will not have to hide any item of truth
for fear of any of the creatures.

lines.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَرْغَبُ إِلَيْكَ فِي دَوْلَةٍ كَرِيمَةٍ
lines.transliteration: allahumma inna narghabu ilayka fi dawlatin karimatin
lines.english: O Allah, we ardently desire that You confer upon us a respectful government
through which You may give might to Islam and its followers,

lines.transliteration: wa tudhillu biha alnnifaqa wa ahlahu
lines.english: humiliate hypocrisy and its people,

lines.arabic: وَتَجْعَلُنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلدُّعَاةِ إِلَىٰ طَاعَتِكَ
lines.transliteration: wa taj`aluna fiha min alddu`ati ila ta`atika
lines.english: and include us among those who invite people to the obedience to You and
and lead them to Your approved path.

lines.transliteration: wa tarzuquna biha karamata alddunya wal-akhirati
lines.english: Give us the good of this world and the world to come.

lines.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ مَا عَرَّفْتَنَا مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ فَحَمِّلْنَاهُ
lines.english: O Allah, let us bear out that which You make known to us as the truth
and let us attain that which we fall short to do.
O Allah, through him, set in order our disorder,
through him gather and unite our flock,
through him stitch together our ripped open separation,
through him increase our few numbers,
through him lift us up from our degradation,
through him grant wealth to the needy among us,
through him pull us out from our debts,
through him set up our poverty,
through him fill the gap of confusion among us,
through him make easy all difficulties we may face,
through him refine our substance and style,
through him release us from captivity,
through him make successful our applications,
through him fulfill Your promises to us,
through him give answer to our prayers,
through him respond to our requests,

lines.arabic: وَبَلِّغْنَا بِهِ مِنَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلآخِرَةِ آمَالَنَا
lines.transliteration: wa ballighna bihi min alddunya wal-akhirati amalana
lines.english: through him make us attain our hopes in this world as well as the world to come,
and through him grant us beyond our wishes.
O Most Favorable of all those whom may be besought
and Most magnanimous of all those who may grant requests!
Through him, heal our breasts,
Through him, remove the rage of our hearts,

lines.arabic: وَٱهْدِنَا بِهِ لِمَا ٱخْتُلِفَ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِكَ
lines.transliteration: wahdina bihi lima ukhtulifa fihi min alhaqqi bi'idhnika
lines.english: and in the event of dispute in the matter of truth, Through him, show us the right path.

lines.arabic: إِنَّكَ تَهْدِي مَنْ تَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
lines.transliteration: innaka tahdi man tasha'u ila siratin mustaqimin
lines.english: Verily, You guide whosoever You will to the Right Path.
Grant us victory Through him, over Your and our enemy.
O God of Truth, respond to us!
O Allah, we complain to You
about the departure of our Prophet, Your blessings be on him and on his Household,
the absence of our leader,
the big numbers of our enemies,
the few number of us,
widespread disorder,
and vicissitudes of time against us.
So, (please do) send blessings to Muhammad and his Household

lines.arabic: وَأَعِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذٰلِكَ بِفَتْحٍ مِنْكَ تُعَجِّلُهُ
lines.transliteration: wa a`inna `ala dhalika bifathin minka tu`ajjiluhu
lines.english: and help us overcome all that through victory from You that You expedite,
through relieving us from our injuries,
through Your help that You confirm,
through bringing in the rule of justice and fair-play,
through mercy that You expand over us,
and through good health that You cover us with,
in the name of Your mercy, O most Merciful of all those who show mercy!
